title: Role of MIC levels and 23S rRNA mutation sites to clarithromycin in 14-day clarithromycin bismuth quadruple therapy for Helicobacter pylori eradication: A prospective trial in Beijing
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Ying Chen, Siyu Li, Wenbin Li, Yiran Wang, Jihua Shi, Xue Xu, Pan Zhang, Dan Chen, Rui Gang, Qingfeng Luo
